summary.span: 包含各种用于与 Visual Basic 6.0 向后兼容的实用工具函数。

span.span: Contains various utility functions for backward compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 项目与的升级过程中使用此类中的函数[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The functions in this class are used during the upgrade of Visual Basic 6.0 projects to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 某些函数替换中不再支持的 Visual Basic 6.0 函数[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]; 其他补偿的对象模型中的差异。Some functions replace Visual Basic 6.0 functions that are no longer supported in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]; others compensate for differences in the object models. 若要在中此类中使用函数[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]项目中，添加对引用`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空间。To use functions in this class in a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] project, add a reference to the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果其中任何一个表达式是`Null`，结果也是`Null`。If either expression is `Null`, result is also `Null`. 当一个表达式都不是`Null`，根据下表确定结果：When neither expression is `Null`, result is determined according to the following table: |如果 expression1If expression1 is|和 expression2 是And expression2 is|结果是The result is| |-----------------------|------------------------|-------------------| |`true`|`true`|`true`| |`true`|`false`|`false`| |`false`|`true`|`false`| |`false`|`false`|`true`| 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`Eqv`运算符不再是 Visual Basic 语言的一部分; 应使用等号 （=） 比较运算符代替了`Eqv`的逻辑评估。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; use the equals (=) comparison operator in place of `Eqv` for logical evaluations. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Eqv`运算符在两个数值表达式执行位置相同的位的按位比较，并设置相应的位根据下表：The `Eqv` operator performs a bitwise comparison of identically positioned bits in two numeric expressions and sets the corresponding bit according to the following table: |如果中 expression1 位是If bit in expression1 is|和中 expression2 位是And bit in expression2 is|结果是The result is| |------------------------------|-------------------------------|-------------------| |00|00|11| |00|11|00| |11|00|00| |11|11|11| 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`Eqv`运算符不再是一部分的 Visual Basic 语言; 的按位评估使用`Not`和`XOr`运算符。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; for bitwise evaluations use the `Not` and `XOr` operators. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，通过将所有可本地化的信息，如字符串，放入单独的资源文件 (.res) 为每种语言创建国际版本应用程序。In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language. 在运行时，区域设置特定资源从中加载资源文件通过调用`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函数。At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，国际版本应用程序创建通过更改`Language`窗体在设计时属性。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time. 为每个区域选择的设置自动创建单独的资源文件 (.resx)。A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected. 你不再需要从代码; 显式加载资源资源会自动加载基于用户的区域。You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale. 有关详细信息，请参阅[全球化 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md). [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，通过将所有可本地化的信息，如字符串，放入单独的资源文件 (.res) 为每种语言创建国际版本应用程序。In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language. 在运行时，区域设置特定资源从中加载资源文件通过调用`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函数。At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，国际版本应用程序创建通过更改`Language`窗体在设计时属性。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time. 为每个区域选择的设置自动创建单独的资源文件 (.resx)。A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected. 你不再需要从代码; 显式加载资源资源会自动加载基于用户的区域。You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale. 有关详细信息，请参阅[全球化 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md). [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`ValidateControls`方法用于强制`Validate`控件具有焦点时关闭窗体; 如果事件`Validate`事件失败，引发了错误。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ValidateControls` method was used to force the `Validate` event for the control that has focus when a form is closed; if the `Validate` event fails, an error was raised. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、`ValidateControls`方法替换为方法，它返回`true`或`false`。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `ValidateControls` method is replaced by the method, which returns `true` or `false`. 此函数通过使用升级工具用于模拟的 Visual Basic 6.0 行为。This function is used by the upgrade tools to emulate the Visual Basic 6.0 behavior.
